debates.showAs: Seán Lemass Dublin International Airport Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the renaming of Dublin Airport as Seán Lemass Dublin International Airport and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú chun Aerfort Bhaile Átha Cliath a athainmniú mar Aerfort Idirnáisiúnta Sheáin Lemass, Baile Átha Cliath agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Seán Lemass Dublin International Airport Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Aerfort Idirnáisiúnta Sheáin Lemass, Baile Átha Cliath, 2025

debates.showAs: Companies (Protection of Title: Accountant) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to regulate the use of the title "accountant", to establish criteria for recognition, and to provide for offences and penalties for misuse of the title, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do rialáil úsáid an teidil "cuntasóir", do bhunú critéir chun aitheantas a fháil, agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cionta agus pionóis i dtaobh mhí-úsáid an teidil, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na gCuideachtaí (Teideal a Chosaint: Cuntasóir), 2025

debates.showAs: Protection of Voice and Image Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to create specific offences for the misuse of an individual’s name, photograph, voice or likeness and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chruthú cionta sonracha i dtaobh ainm, grianghraf, glór nó dealramh pearsan aonair a mhí-úsáid agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of Voice and Image Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosaint Glóir agus Íomhá, 2025

debates.showAs: Disability (Personalised Budgets) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Disability (Personalised Budgets) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Disability Act 2005 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Míchumas, 2005 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Bail (Amendment) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Schedule to the Bail Act 1997 so as to include a reference to an offence under section 39 of the Domestic Violence Act 2018 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Sceidil a ghabhann leis an Acht um Bannaí, 1997 chun tagairt do chion faoi alt 39 den Acht um Fhoréigean Baile, 2018 a áireamh agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Health (Postponement of Certain Leave) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Maternity Protection Act 1994 and the Adoptive Leave Act 1995 and for those purposes to provide a mechanism to postpone maternity leave or adoptive leave in circumstances where a person is diagnosed with or being treated for cancer and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Chosaint Mháithreachais, 1994 agus an Achta um Shaoire Uchtaíoch, 1995 agus chun na gcríoch sin do sholáthar sásra chun saoire mháithreachais nó saoire uchtaíoch a iarchur in imthosca ina bhfáthmheastar go bhfuil ailse ar dhuine nó ina bhfuil cóireáil in aghaidh ailse á cur ar dhuine agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte (Saoire Áirithe a Iarchur), 2024

debates.showAs: Protection of Retail Workers Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Criminal Justice (Public Order) Act 1994 to create specific offences for assaulting or threatening retail workers carrying out their employment.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí), 1994 chun cionta sonracha a chruthú arb éard iad ionsaí nó bagairt a dhéanamh ar oibrithe miondíola atá ag gabháil dá bhfostaíocht.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Oibrithe Miondíola a Chosaint, 2024

debates.showAs: Control of Dogs (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Control of Dogs (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Control of Dogs Act 1986, and for that purpose, to provide for dog control notices, to provide for notices relating to the exclusion of dogs from certain premises, to amend the Control of Dogs (Dog Licensing Database) Regulations 2019 so as to provide for the mandatory maintenance of a dog licensing database, to amend the Local Government Act 2001 to provide for public places where dogs can be off leash and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Rialú Madraí, 1986 agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le fógraí um rialú madraí, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le fógraí i ndáil le madraí a eisiamh ó áitribh áirithe, do leasú na Rialachán um Rialú Madraí (Bunachar Sonraí Ceadúnaithe Madraí), 2019 d’fhonn socrú a dhéanamh maidir le cothabháil shainordaitheach a dhéanamh ar bhunachar sonraí ceadúnaithe madraí, do leasú an Achta Rialtais Áitiúil, 2001 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le háiteanna poiblí inar féidir madraí a scaoileadh ón iall agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rialú Madraí (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2024

debates.showAs: Education (Relationships and Sexuality Education) (Amendment) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Education Act 1988 (as amended) to make provision for the implementation of relationship and sexuality education in primary and post-primary schools without any influence of religious ethos on relationship and sexuality education, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Act do leasú an Achta Oideachais, 1988 (arna leasú) chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le hoideachas caidreamh agus gnéasachta a chur i ngníomh i mbunscoileanna agus in iarbhunscoileanna gan tionchar ar bith a bheith ag éiteas creidimh ar oideachas caidreamh agus gnéasachta, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Oideachais (Oideachas Caidreamh agus Gnéasachta) (Leasú), 2022

debates.showAs: Local Government (Surveillance Powers in Relation to Certain Offences) Bill 2022: Order for Second Stage
Local Government (Surveillance Powers in Relation to Certain Offences) Bill 2022: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to empower local authorities to authorise the installation and operation of surveillance devices for the purposes of deterring, preventing, detecting and prosecuting certain offences, to provide for exchange of certain data from third party data controllers to local authorities for the purposes of the performance of their functions in relation to such offences, to make certain provision for the purposes of regulating the performance of functions under this Act and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chumhachtú d’údaráis áitiúla a údarú feistí faireachais a shuiteáil agus a oibriú d’fhonn daoine a chur ó chionta áirithe a dhéanamh agus d’fhonn cionta áirithe a chosc, a bhrath agus a ionchúiseamh, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le sonraí áirithe a aistriú ó rialaitheoirí sonraí tríú páirtí chuig údaráis áitiúla chun a bhfeidhmeanna a chomhlíonadh i ndáil le cionta den sórt sin, do dhéanamh foráil áirithe chun comhlíonadh feidhmeanna faoin Acht seo a rialáil agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Local Government (Surveillance Powers in Relation to Certain Offences) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Rialtais Áitiúil (Cumhachtaí Faireachais i nDáil le Cionta Áirithe), 2022

debates.showAs: Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2021 and the Environmental Protection Agency Acts 1992 to 2011 to make exceptional provision for peat extraction for the purpose of horticulture for a temporary period in the public interest in order to mitigate the adverse consequences resulting, or likely to result from an interruption to supply and to provide for a just transition.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 go 2021 agus na nAchtanna fán nGníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil, 1992 go 2011 chun socrú eisceachtúil a dhéanamh maidir le baint móna chun críche gairneoireachta ar feadh tréimhse shealadach ar mhaithe le leas an phobail d’fhonn maolú a dhéanamh ar na hiarmhairtí dochracha a bheidh, nó is dóigh a bheidh, mar thoradh ar bhriseadh ar sholáthar agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le trasdul cóir.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Móin Ghairneoireachta (Bearta Sealadacha), 2021

debates.showAs: Protection of Private Residences (Against Targeted Picketing) Bill 2021: Report and Final Stages
Protection of Private Residencies (Against Targeted Picketing) Bill 2021: Order for Committee Stage
Protection of Private Residencies (Against Targeted Picketing) Bill 2021: Committee Stage
Protection of Private Residences (Against Targeted Picketing) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Protection of Private Residences (Against Targeted Picketing) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision for the prevention of the targeted picketing of a private residence and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú chun cosc a chur le picéadú spriocdhírithe ar áit chónaithe phríobháideach agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of Private Residences (Against Targeted Picketing) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Áiteanna Cónaithe Príobháideacha a Chosaint (Ar Phicéadú Spriocdhírithe), 2021

debates.showAs: Electoral (Amendment) (Voting at 16) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Electoral (Amendment) (Voting at 16) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to reduce to sixteen years the age at which a person is entitled to be registered as a European Parliament and local government elector, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do laghdú go dtí sé bliana déag an aois ag a mbeidh duine i dteideal a bheith cláraithe mar thoghthóir do Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus mar thoghthóir rialtais áitiúil, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Health Insurance (International Students) (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Health Insurance Act 1994 (as amended) to introduce a new definition of a health insurance contract to that contained in Section 2 of the Principal Act so as to exclude international students who are not ordinarily resident in Ireland; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Árachais Sláinte, 1994 (arna leasú) chun míniú nua ar chonradh árachais sláinte a thabhairt isteach in ionad an mhínithe atá in Alt 2 den Phríomh-Acht d’fhonn mic léinn idirnáisiúnta nach bhfuil gnáthchónaí orthu in Éirinn a eisiamh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Árachais Sláinte (Mic Léinn Idirnáisiúnta) (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Defence (Restriction on Use of Certain Titles) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Defence (Restriction on Use of Certain Titles) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn:
Bill entitled an Act to restrict the use of the terms "Óglaigh na hÉireann" and "Defence Forces" to the
defence forces raised and maintained under the Defence Acts 1954 to 2015, and for that
purpose to restrict the inclusion of those words in the names of certain other bodies by
amending the Defence Act 1954, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do shrianadh úsáid na dtéarmaí “Óglaigh na hÉireann” agus “Defence Forces” do na fórsaí cosanta a bhunaítear agus a chothabháiltear faoi na hAchtanna Cosanta, 1954 go 2015, agus, chun na críche sin, do shrianadh na focail sin a bheith ar áireamh in ainmneacha comhlachtaí áirithe eile tríd an Acht Cosanta, 1954, a leasú, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Defence (Restriction on Use of Certain Titles) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Cosanta (Srian le Teidil Áirithe a Úsáid), 2021

debates.showAs: Seanad Electoral (University Members) (Amendment) Bill 2020: Committee Stage
Seanad Electoral (University Members) (Amendment) Bill 2020: Second Stage (Resumed)
Seanad Electoral (University Members) (Amendment) Bill 2020: Second Stage
Seanad Bill 2020: First Stage
Seanad Electoral (University Members) (Amendment) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the amendment of the Seanad Electoral (University Members) Acts 1937 to 2006, to provide for the provisions of the seventh amendment of Bunreacht na hÉireann and to extend the franchise of the university panel of Seanad Éireann to all people who are over eighteen and are holders of an appropriate third level qualification from an Irish Institute of Higher Education and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hAchtanna Toghcháin an tSeanaid (Comhaltaí Ollscoile), 1937 go 2006 a leasú, chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le forálacha an seachtú leasú ar Bhunreacht na hÉireann agus chun toghchóras rolla ollscoile Sheanad Éireann a leathnú chuig na daoine go léir atá os cionn ocht mbliana déag agus ar sealbhóirí iad ar cháilíocht tríú leibhéal chuí ó Fhoras Ardoideachais in Éirinn agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
